Content.Data:
After you are done editing guidance, you must publish guidance to TEAM Mentor 4.x user interface.
* Open Tbot interface * In the Admin row select "Publish Data" Click on Publish Data. Note the process takes some time (around 5 minutes) during which time TEAM Mentor front end web site is unavailable. Do not interrupt the process.
![Image Text](/Image/publish-data-01.png)
